description: This file defines an interface IPCReceiverHandler for handling inter-process communication requests, including marshaled and direct requests, in a Java project related to IPC mechanisms.

classes.name: IPCReceiverHandler
classes.description: An interface specifying methods to process IPC requests, both marshaled and direct, within the application.

methods.name: handleMarshaledRequest
methods.description: Processes an IPC request that involves marshaling, decoding message payloads, and returns success or failure code.

methods.name: handleDirectRequest
methods.description: Processes an IPC request within the same process without marshaling, using input and output ObjectIPC objects.
